Package com.alvermont.terraj.fracplanet.ui

Contains code that handles the Swing user interface for the fractal planetary terrain generator.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
AboutBoxDialog The about box for the planet UI program
AbstractTerrainViewerFrame UI class for terrain display.
CameraPosDialog A dialog that manages a list of saved camera positions
CameraTableModel Table model for the camera table display, wraps up a list of camera positions
ControlsDialog UI Class for the display controls
ControlsHelpDialog A dialog containing help information on the camera keys for the free camera mode.
ImportXMLSettingsDialog Dialog for importing parts of an XML settings file
ProgressDialog Dialog that handles the progress bar display
TerrainViewerFrame An implementation of the terrain viewer.
 

Package com.alvermont.terraj.fracplanet.ui Description

Contains code that handles the Swing user interface for the fractal planetary terrain generator.
